summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Utah Street, from the south margin of Connecticut Street to the north line of the canal waterway; and Hanford Street, from Utah Street to First Avenue South, by planking the same, in accordance with Resolution No. 1068 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Immediate Payment," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
